misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko, a golfer known for his calculated approach and unwavering focus, brings a wealth of experience to the greens of the Hector Trophée.

A member of Lakeside Golf Vammala, Mikko's dedication to the sport is evident in his consistent participation, with Hector Trophée 2025 marking his 11th appearance in the prestigious tournament. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Mikko remains a formidable competitor, always strategizing for the next challenge.

Off the course, Mikko is known for his… colorful personal life. He likes to boast about having planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades, a testament to his… enduring vitality.
Despite the distractions, Mikko's commitment to golf remains steadfast, and he is eagerly anticipated to bring his experience and determination to Hector Trophée 2025.
